oai_dc:dc.dc:title: John Stark
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait of John Stark (1728-1822), shows him standing on the battlefield.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Generals; Uniforms; Battlefields; Portraits
Stark, John, 1728-1822
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Born in New Hampshire, John Stark joined Roger's Rangers as a lieutenant in 1756 and was one of George Washington's Generals during the American Revolution.
